definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: headgear, c. acc. rei, [[לְ]] pers. Ex 29:9, Le 8:13 (both P); c. [[לְ]] pers. Ez Eze 24:17 (P); pass. of seaweeds clinging about head [[סוּף חָבוּשׁ]] [[לְראׁשִׁי]] Jon 2:6; c. sf. pers. et [[בְּ]] rei [[וׇאֶחְבְּשֵׁח]] Ez Eze 16:10 and I bound (or wound) about thee (i.e. thy head, Sm VB) [[שֵׁשׁ]] (in metaph. of ´[[י]]'s care for Jerus.; ‖[[אַלְבִּישֵׁח]], [[אֶנְעֲלֵח]]); fig. of punishment for wicked [[פְּנֵיהֶם חֲבשׁ בממון]] Job 40:13 bind their faces in darkness (‖[[טָמְנֵם בֶּעָפָר]]) v. Di.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: pass. prob. twined, twisted in [[חֲבָלִים חֲבֻשִׁים וַאֲרֻוִים]] Ez Eze 27:24, cords twisted and strong, v. Sm Da. Esp.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of equipping a beast for riding; ass, in acc. Ge 22:3, Nu 22:21 (both E), 2Sa 17:23 & 2Sa 19:27 (where however rd. [[לוֹ חָבְשָׁה־לִּי]], so LXX SyrVer Vulgate Th We Dr), 1Ki 2:40, 1Ki 13:13, 1Ki 13:13, 1Ki 13:23, 1Ki 13:27, 1Ki 13:27 (v:1Ki 13:27 b no dir. obj. expressed) 2Ki 4:24; pass., also of asses, Ju Jdg 19:10, 2Sa 16:1.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: fig. = restrain, control (Germ. bändigen), abs. Job 34:17.
